name: Prairie Of Forgotten Dreams
description:
Transported to the end of the universe at the end of time, looking for your Other...switching between worlds only you know

WASD keys to move, mouse to look. Press F to "switch." Best played with headphones.

Klyde Breitton -- Programming & Concept

Veena Krish -- Programming

Lauren Marquez -- Programming

Reika Yoshino -- Art

Music is "The Night" by Mr. Mitch
